thread.title: Embarrassed lad sends Tattoo Fixers viewers into fits of laughter with inking accusing Gary Lineker of having sex with crisps
thread.title_full: Embarrassed lad sends Tattoo Fixers viewers into fits of laughter with inking accusing Gary Lineker of having sex with crisps

author: Kyle O'Sullivan
title: Embarrassed lad sends Tattoo Fixers viewers into fits of laughter with inking accusing Gary Lineker of having sex with crisps
text:
Embarrassed lad sends Tattoo Fixers viewers into fits of laughter with inking accusing Gary Lineker of having sex with crisps The Match of the Day hosts hidden secret was revealed in permanent ink form Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Guy on Tattoo Fixers embarrassed by Gary Lineker themed tattoo Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Tattoo Fixers viewers were sent into fits of laughter last night when an embarrassed lad revealed a ridiculous inking around his nipple. 
18-year-old Joe went under the needle while on holiday in Kavos, but was forced by his mum to come on the show. 
Jay and Sketch couldn't believe their eyes when he lifted up his shirt to reveal a cringeworthy tat that read: "Gary Lineker s**gs crisps." 
The Southampton teenager wanted a cover-up to hide the permanent reminder that the former England striker is the face of Walkers and a massive crisp lover. Read More Joe revealed his embarrassing inking to the Tattoo Fixers (Photo: E4) The cheeky tattoo seems to suggest Gary Lineker likes crisps more than we thought (Photo: E4) 
Joe told that tattooists that the body art had gained fame on social media and was picked up by national media after his friend Jordan posted a snap on twitter. 
He said: "One of my mates decided to post it online and it went viral. 
"My mum rang me after seeing it in the papers and she was really angry. 
"I want to get this covered up because it's absolutely ridiculous and it's ruining my life. I'll never get a job." Read More Joe was sent by his outraged mum for a cover-up (Photo: E4) Jay and Sketch have seen some awful tattoos but this still shocked them (Photo: E4) 
Sketch said: "I cant even think what was going through your mind that day." 
A sheepish Joe replied: "I didn't really think to be honest." 
Gary Lineker himself seemed to enjoy the joke when it first came to public attention, as back in August he tweeted: “I’m not sure it’s even possible. Goodness knows, I’ve tried!” 
Thankfully he had the terrible tattoo replaced with a large angel, a design he hoped his mum would be more accepting of. 
Viewers were in hysterics as Joe revealed his shameful inking on TV. No pain no gain (Photo: E4) The teen was delighted with his new angel tattoo (Photo: E4) 
One amused viewer tweeted: “Gary Lineker s**gs crisps is possibly my fave tattoo ever” 
Another added: “Haha there's a guy on tattoo fixers who's got @GaryLineker s**gs crisps tattooed on his chest!! What a t**t.” 
A third said: “I quite liked the Gary Lineker tattoo too” 
Gary Lineker himself seemed to enjoy the joke when it first came to public attention, as back in August he tweeted: “I’m not sure it’s even possible. Goodness knows, I’ve tried!” 
Tattoo Fixers airs on E4 on Tuesday at 9pm. Like us on Facebook
